Eldritch Bounty.name: Legendary Node
Eldritch Bounty.title: Eldritch Bounty
Eldritch Bounty.description: When you attack with an Imbued Skill, you gain +3% Maximum Resistance and 20% increased damage for that Imbuement's element for 9 seconds.

Tricks of the Trade.name: Legendary Node
Tricks of the Trade.title: Tricks of the Trade
Tricks of the Trade.description: Your Marksman Skills grant your Cutthroat Skills x25% increased damage for 8 seconds. Your Cutthroat Skills grant your Marksman Skills x25% increased damage for 8 seconds.

Cheap Shot.name: Legendary Node
Cheap Shot.title: Cheap Shot
Cheap Shot.description: You deal x5% increased damage for each Nearby enemy that is Crowd Controlled, up to x25%. A Nearby Staggered Boss provides the maximum bonus.

Deadly Ambush.name: Legendary Node
Deadly Ambush.title: Deadly Ambush
Deadly Ambush.description: You deal x22% increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills.

Deadly Ambush.title: Cunning
effects: 6% Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Trap Skills

Deadly Ambush.name: Magic Node
effects: 3% Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Trap Skills

effects: 3% Damage Reduction from Enemies Affected by Trap Skills

Leyrana's Instinct.name: Legendary Node
Leyrana's Instinct.title: Leyrana's Instinct
Leyrana's Instinct.description: When Inner Sightâ€™s gauge becomes full, you gain +100% Dodge Chance for 2 seconds. Your Core Skills deal increased damage equal to x25% of your Core Skill Damage Bonus while Inner Sightâ€™s gauge remains full, up to x35%.

No Witnesses.name: Legendary Node
No Witnesses.title: No Witnesses
No Witnesses.description: Your Ultimate Skills gain an additional x10% damage from your Damage with Ultimate bonus, up to x45%, and grant this bonus to all Skills for 10 seconds when cast.

Exploit Weakness.name: Legendary Node
Exploit Weakness.title: Exploit Weakness
Exploit Weakness.description: Lucky Hit: Hitting a vulnerable enemy has up to a 60% chance to increase your damage by x1% for 25 seconds, up to x25%. At 25 stacks the bonus remains for 6 seconds then expires.

Cunning Stratagem.name: Legendary Node
Cunning Stratagem.title: Cunning Stratagem
Cunning Stratagem.description: Your non-damage Combo Point bonuses are increased by x33.33% when you spend 3 Combo Points.

Danse Macabre.name: Legendary Node
Danse Macabre.title: Danse Macabre
Danse Macabre.description: Casting a Mobility or Subterfuge Skill increases the damage of your next Skill by x50%.
